text:
Hi all,
I just tried to register a new package using registrator.jl (this is my first time),
<https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/27059>
I get the errors:

I was not able to install the package (i.e. Pkg.add("DAMMmodel") failed). See the CI logs for details.
I was not able to load the package (i.e. import DAMMmodel failed). See the CI logs for details.

and I am not sure what to do, on my REPL, these work perfectly fine:
```]activate .
import DAMMmodel```
then I can use my package normally.

Any idea of how I could troubleshoot this? I probably did something wrong!

text: Seems like your package doesn't declare compatibility with Julia 1.5 (see <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/27059/checks?check_run_id=1623199099#step:6:149>)

elements.text: Seems like your package doesn't declare compatibility with Julia 1.5 (see

text: And new packages are expected to work with the latest  Julia version, apparently (although that might just be a byproduct of the bot running on 1.5)

elements.text: And new packages are expected to work with the latest  Julia version, apparently (although that might just be a byproduct of the bot running on 1.5)

text:
I see, thanks! I'll put the julia [compat] to 1.5
EDIT: it worked =)
